episodes.title: OW134: A Jar Of Acid by The Black Museum
episodes.author: RelicRadio.com
episodes.summary: On today’s show, we’ll hear another story from The Black Museum.  This series shared the stories of items contained in the Crime Museum of Scotland Yard. The featured item, and title of this episode, is A Jar Of Acid.  The series aired from January to December 1952. [audio:http://archive.org/download/owota2/owota134.mp3] Download owota134

episodes.title: OW128: Turnabout Is Foul Play by Lives Of Harry Lime
episodes.author: RelicRadio.com
episodes.summary: We’ll hear the 32nd episode from The Lives Of Harry Lime on today’s show.  Turnabout Is Foul Play first aired March 7, 1952.  The audio quality is pretty horrendous on this one – consider yourself warned.  It’s included here only to offer a complete set of this series. [audio:http://archive.org/download/owota2/owota128.mp3] Download owota128

episodes.author: RelicRadio.com

episodes.title: OW126: Hyacinth Patrol by Lives Of Harry Lime
episodes.author: RelicRadio.com
episodes.summary: More from The Lives Of Harry Lime on this episode.  We’ll hear the 31st program from which first aired February 29, 1952 titled Hyacinth Patrol. The audio quality of this episode is quite poor.  I’ve decided to include for the sake of completeness while we replay this series.  You’ve been warned. [audio:http://archive.org/download/OWOTA1/owota126.mp3] Download owota126

episodes.title: OW125: Between Americans by Screen Guild Theater
episodes.author: RelicRadio.com
episodes.summary: The Screen Guild Theater brings us our featured show this time.  From December 7, 1941 we’ll hear Between Americans.  This series aired from 1939 to 1952, and was broadcast at one time or another from all of the major radio networks. [audio:http://archive.org/download/owota2/owota125.mp3] Download owota125

episodes.title: OW124: The Tan Shoe by The Black Museum
episodes.author: RelicRadio.com
episodes.summary: Hosted by Orson Welles, The Black Museum aired for 52 episodes and featured stories behind the objects contained within the Scotland Yard crime museum. This episode is titled The Tan Shoe. [audio:http://archive.org/download/owota2/owota124.mp3] Download owota124
